EmailTemplate.name: Discretionary Close Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Action required: Close Charge Number # {!Discretionary_Line_Item__c.Discretionary_Account__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Honeywell colleague,
Please note that Charge # {!Discretionary_Line_Item__c.Discretionary_Account__c} provided (below) are to be CLOSED, per the subject request.
Material Labor: Travel: Others:
Thank you, we appreciate your support!
